changeSet.author: mat_dev_user
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `CQL_LIBRARY` ( `ID` INT NOT NULL, `MEASURE_ID` VARCHAR(64) NULL, `MEASURE_SET_ID` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `CQL_SET_ID` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `CQL_NAME` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `DRAFT` TINYINT(1) NULL DEFAULT 1, `VERSION` DECIMAL(6,3) NULL DEFAULT '0.000', `FINALIZED_DATE` TIMESTAMP NULL, `RELEASE_VERSION` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `OWNER_ID` VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, `LOCKED_USER` VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, `LOCKED_OUT_DATE` TIMESTAMP NULL, `CQL_XML` LONGBLOB NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`), INDEX `LOCKED_USER_ID_FK_idx` (`LOCKED_USER` ASC), INDEX `CQL_OWNER_ID_FK_idx` (`OWNER_ID` ASC), CONSTRAINT `LOCKED_USER_ID_FK` FOREIGN KEY (`LOCKED_USER`) REFERENCES `USER` (`USER_ID`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `CQL_OWNER_ID_FK` FOREIGN KEY (`OWNER_ID`) REFERENCES `USER` (`USER_ID`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;
